Application Components
These are deployed software systems that provide specific application functionality to users or systems. They typically sit on top of the technology platform and deliver business support.
Solution / Feature - Why It's an Application Component (TOGAF)
Microsoft Power BI Pro / PPU - BI/reporting application used by business users. Azure SQL Database - A database platform service that supports application functionality. PaperCut MF - Application managing printer usage and quotas. Microsoft 365 Apps + Exchange + Teams + SharePoint - User-facing productivity apps with business functionality. Ekahau Pro - WiFi design tool – specific engineering app, not core infrastructure. Microsoft Defender Vulnerability Management - Application layer that works on top of infrastructure. Microsoft Entra Conditional Access (Policy Engine) - Application logic layer built on Entra ID identity foundation. RTLS / Asset Tracking – Cisco DNA Spaces - Application for real-time location analytics.
